applicable_taxes.description: List of the shop's applicable taxes

approval_delay.description: Average time for a shop to accept or refuse an order (in seconds)

banner.description: Url of the shop's banner image

channels.description: List of the channel codes associated to the shop

closed_from.description: The start date of the closing of the shop

closed_to.description: The end date of the closing of the shop

currency_iso_code.description: The currency of the shop (iso format)

default_billing_information.description: The default billing information of the shop, used for invoicing and reporting purposes

description.description: The description of the shop, max length: 3000 characters.

evaluations_count.description: Number of evaluations for the shop

free_shipping.description: Whether or not this shop offers free shipping to customers

is_professional.description: Whether or not the shop is professional

kyc.description: KYC information (only supported when KYC feature is enabled)

last_updated_date.description:
The date of the last modification of the shop. Note: The following statistics fields do not update the last_updated date:
  • orders_count
  • offers_count
  • evaluations_count
  • grade
  • approval_rate
  • approval_delay
  • order_messages_response_delay

logo.description: Url of the shop's logo image

model.description:
Shop platform model, current possible values :
  • MARKETPLACE
  • DROPSHIP
  • ONE_CREDITOR

offers_count.description: Total count of active offers of the shop

order_messages_response_delay.description: Average time for a shop to answer to an order message (in seconds)

orders_count.description: Total count of debited orders (or if Pay on Delivery, accepted) of the shop

premium.description: Whether or not the shop is premium

producer_identifiers.description: List of shop’s producer identifiers per Extended Producer Responsibility (EPR) categories. Only available if the operator setting Activate data collection related to circular economy regulations is enabled.

recycling_policy.description: Recycling policy - only available if the operator setting Activate data collection related to circular economy regulations has been enabled.

return_policy.description: Terms of restitution, max length: 60000 characters.

shipping_country.description: Code ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 of the shipping country

shipping_types.description: List of shipping types of the shop

shipping_zones.description: List of shipping zones of the shop

shippings.description: All the pair shipping zone / shipping type accepted by the shop

specific_billing_informations.description:
The list of specific billing information of the shop, used for invoicing and reporting purposes
Applies only when the shop is professional

suspension_type.description:
Shop suspension type, current possible values:
  • MANUAL: Shop account has been manually suspended in the back-office
  • PENDING_APPROVAL: Shop account has been suspended at creation
  • AUTOMATIC_SUSPENSION: Shop account has been suspended by Mirakl Quality Control
  • INCOMPLETE_PROFILE: Shop account is suspended because some mandatory fields are missing in its profile

fee_types.description: The types of fees to which the tax will be applied.

owner.description: Name of the owner of the bank account

civility.description: Civility of the contact (Mr, Mrs, Miss or Neutral)

street1.description: First line of the address of the contact

street2.description: Second line of the address of the contact

accepted_values.description: The list of accepted values for this additional field. This field is only present for additional fields of type 'LIST'

description.description: The description of the additional field.

editable.description: Whether or not the additional field will be editable

entity.description: The object on which the additional field applies

regex.description:
The regular expression that is used to validate the value value of this field.
This field is only present for additional fields of type 'REGEX'.

required.description: Whether or not this additionnal field will be required

type.description:
Additional field type:
  • STRING chain of characters (up to 2000 characters)
  • DATE date in yyyy-mm-dd format
  • NUMERIC decimal value (eg 52.63)
  • BOOLEAN true or false
  • LINK valid URL
  • LIST list of values. Valid values are specified in accepted_values field

type.description:
Pricing type
When the price type is FIXED_PRICE, the price defined when placing an order is final. The price cannot be modified.
When the price type is ESTIMATED_PRICE, the price can be negotiated between the seller and the customer. The price can be updated by editing the pricing options of the order.
When the price type is FIXED_PRICE_MULTI, the price defined when placing an order is final. The price cannot be modified. The price has multiple possibilities.
When the price type is ESTIMATED_PRICE_MULTI, the price can be negotiated between the seller and the customer. The price can be updated by editing the pricing options of the order. The price has multiple possibilities.

min_price_per_unit.description: Minimum price at which the service will be provided. It's a price per unit.

options.description: Service pricing options. The list is ordered as configured by the operator.

type.description:
Price type of the service.
When the price type is FIXED_PRICE, the price defined when placing an order is final. The price cannot be modified.
When the price type is ESTIMATED_PRICE, the price can be negotiated between the seller and the customer. The price can be updated by editing the pricing options of the order.
When the price type is FIXED_PRICE_MULTI, the price defined when placing an order is final. The price cannot be modified. The price has multiple possibilities.
When the price type is ESTIMATED_PRICE_MULTI, the price can be negotiated between the seller and the customer. The price can be updated by editing the pricing options of the order. The price has multiple possibilities.

get.description:
• It is mandatory to specify either the shop_ids or the document_ids.
  • If a list of document identifiers is specified only these documents are downloaded.
    • If more than one document id is specified, the documents will be wrapped in a ZIP archive
    • If only one document id is specified the document will not be zipped
  • If no document identifiers is specified, all the shop documents will be downloaded.
    Use a list of shop document type codes to retrieve specific types from your shop.
    In this case, the output of the API will always be a ZIP archive even if there is only one document to retrieve.

When documents are retrieved, they're wrapped into a ZIP archive except when only one document id is specified. The tree structure of this archive is as follow:

documents-timestamp.zip
|__ shop_id/
|   |__ image.png
|   |__ image(1).png
|   |__ foo.txt

Returns a 404 if at least one document id or one document type code is invalid
